attributes.action: We need the goverment to grow a set and protect the people of this country
attributes.additional_details: We the people of the United Kingdom want the goverment to stand up for our rights against extremist groups, we are sick of hearing that the human rights court of appeal has refused us deportation rights, if someone causes a threat to the national security of this country and to the people that live here regardless of race & religion then we need to make a stance and deport them or send them to prison so that no harm can be done. We need to protect our future for us and our children and live as one in peace and harmony.
